mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, CLOSING_BRANCH_NO AS closingBranchNo, CLOSING_CORNER_CODE AS closingCornerCode, ADDR AS addr, UNUSL AS unusl FROM ATMS_02001120

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, CLOSING_BRANCH_NO AS closingBranchNo, CLOSING_CORNER_CODE AS closingCornerCode, ADDR AS addr, UNUSL AS unusl FROM ATMS_02001120 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001120 SET CHANGE_CHASU = #{changeChasu}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, CLOSING_BRANCH_NO = #{closingBranchNo}, CLOSING_CORNER_CODE = #{closingCornerCode}, ADDR = #{addr}, UNUSL = #{unusl} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001120 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_CHASU, STEXT_GUBUN, CLOSING_BRANCH_NO, CLOSING_CORNER_CODE, ADDR, UNUSL ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{changeChasu}, #{stextGubun}, #{closingBranchNo}, #{closingCornerCode}, #{addr}, #{unusl} )
